h1: How Many Calories in a Peanut Butter Sandwich?
assumptions: 2 slices white bread (about 28 g each), 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter (32 g), no jelly, butter, or extras; standard commercial brands.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, peanut butter brand, portion size, and additions like jelly. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A typical peanut butter sandwich contains about 350 calories and 13 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a peanut butter sandwich with jelly?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal if adding 1 tbsp jelly to the standard base.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a peanut butter sandwich?
faqs.a: Around 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are peanut butter sandwiches high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 18 g total fat per sandwich, mainly healthy unsaturated fats from peanuts.

faqs.q: How does bread type affect calories in a PB sandwich?
faqs.a: White bread adds ~150 kcal for 2 slices; whole wheat is similar but may add more fiber.
